title: #127: RCP Live at CrimeCon
description:
To mark the one month anniversary of the arrest of the #EastAreaRapist #GoldenStateKiller we have a very special episode dedicated to all the victims, survivors, thrivers and families and those who never gave up.


The RCP team were joined by brave and courageous Jane Carson-Sandler, who was brutally victimised by the East Area Rapist. Jane tells her story about what happened and her journey from victim, to survivor, to thriver. We were delighted that Mike Morford, from Criminology podcast, weighed in on the discussion live at CrimeCon, Nashville.


#VictimsVoice

#VictimsMatter

#CrimeCon

#Nashville

#NeverGiveUp

#JusticeIsHere

#HesGoingDown


Show notes

Jane’s book “Frozen in Fear” is available on Amazon

https://www.amazon.co.uk/Frozen-Fear-Story-Surviving-Shadows/dp/1491735996


Criminology podcast 

https://itunes.apple.com/gb/podcast/criminology/id1264424015?mt=2&i=1000403656753
